summary: A small town girl lands in big bad Mumbai to earn an honest living but faces a confrontation she would've never dreamt of in her wildest dreams.
cast: Rani Mukerji|Jaya Bachchan|Konkona Sen Sharma|Kunal Kapoor|Anupam Kher|Abhishek Bachchan|Hema Malini|Murli Sharma|Kamini Kaushal|Harsh Chhaya|Tinnu Anand|Sushant Singh|Taraana Raja|Suchitra Pillai|Ninad Kamat|Bharti Achrekar|Shriya Sharma|Ameya Pandya|Nishikant Dixit|Kalki Koechlin|Sachin Parikh|Yogendra Singh Waldia|Vishal Om Prakash
title: Laaga Chunari Mein Daag: Journey of a Woman
